Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie was decent produced though.
Definitely not worth to watch.
I was hoping for a treat seeing this film being so popular but sadly it wasn't. If any Disney park would ever turn into another source for income as Disneyland did that one could be found next to the Graceland and Elvis-Museums

What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy fliers have long since fled Planet Earth, for with enough money one doesn’t need to weigh under 50 pounds in order to go flying off through space into orbit. Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless action film. In Canada stopping for gasoline, Joe fends off an attack by the evil henchman (played with gusto by Dale Jacoby), and learns one of his friends was beaten and killed at their hotel room at night.
